name: memory-cache2
description: Creates an object cache in memory for use in browser or node. Cache instances are observable and can listen for or emit events. Can daisy chain key to get and set keys like `cache.get('deep.nested.keys.0.objArr1')`

name: hapli
description: CLI tools and generators to build Hapi apps

name: hapi-accept-language2
description: Parse accept-language header and attach to request for hapi

name: riot-action-forms
description: Makes forms observable and binds field validations.

name: riot-meiosis
description: Meiosis state manager for Riot using Erre

name: saga-slice
description: Combines reducers, types, actions and sagas into 1 config file

name: hapi-utility-belt
description: A series of utilities for building hapi apps

name: riot-final-form
description: Riot HOC for using Final Form

name: strom
description: A stream based state manager inspired by meiosis pattern
